title: Pinger
description: A tool for accountants that allows them to configure their own ping alerts from QuickBooks Online or Xero.

title: Tapfood
description: A webapp for a food delivery service based in New Jersey. Orders coming in everyday!

title: My Bus Home
description: A website for a bus transportation business that transports college students to and from colleges along the east coast.

title: Rep Rat (In progress)
description: A commissions tracking application for QuickBooks users to automatically keep track of their sales performances.
